loginDialog.title: Login required
loginDialog.descriptionQueue: To add jobs to your queue and start sending applications, you need to be logged in.
loginDialog.descriptionGeneric: To access this feature, you need to be logged in.
loginDialog.benefit: ‚ú® Create your free account and start automating your H-2A/H-2B job applications!

auth.hero_tagline: Save time and find real H-2A & H-2B opportunities

signup.title: Create your account
signup.description: Start applying to H-2A/H-2B jobs today

errors.email_rate_limit_desc: Please wait a few minutes and try again. We temporarily limited new confirmation emails to protect deliverability.
errors.weak_password_desc: This password is too common and easy to guess. Please choose a stronger one.

recovery.request_desc: Enter your email and we‚Äôll send a secure reset link.
recovery.sent_desc: If {{email}} exists in our system, you‚Äôll receive a reset link in a few minutes.
recovery.reset_desc: Choose a new password for your account.

toasts.sent_desc: We sent a password reset link if the email exists.
toasts.reset_success_desc: You can now sign in with your new password.

confirmation.processing_desc: We‚Äôre validating your link and starting a secure session.
confirmation.success_desc: All set. You can now create a new password.
confirmation.error_desc: Something went wrong while preparing your reset. Please try again.

validation.invalid_phone: Phone must be in international format (E.164), e.g. +15551234567.
validation.invalid_contact_email: Please enter a valid contact email.
validation.accept_required: You must accept the terms to create an account.

auth.disclaimer: Notice: H2 Linker helps you send applications efficiently, but does not guarantee any job offer or visa approval.
auth.accept_terms: I agree to the terms and understand the system does not guarantee any job offer.

marketing.q1: How many hours do you spend searching for H-2A/H-2B jobs?
marketing.q2: Stop wasting time sending emails one by one. Automate and multiply your chances.
marketing.subline: Less manual work. More applications sent. More opportunities.
marketing.footer: Connecting you to verified H-2A/H-2B employers from the first send.

toasts.success_desc: Your report was sent and helps us maintain job quality.
toasts.already_reported_desc: You have already flagged an issue with this job.

welcome.title: Welcome to H2 Linker!
welcome.description: Let's set up your account to start sending job applications safely.
welcome.step1_desc: Set up SMTP with your Gmail or Outlook account.
welcome.step2_desc: Configure email warm-up to protect your reputation.
welcome.step3_desc: Browse jobs and send applications at scale.

smtp.title: Connect Your Email
smtp.description: We'll use your email to send job applications on your behalf.

complete.title: You're all set!
complete.description: Your account is ready to start sending applications.

toasts.remove_success_desc: The job was removed from your queue.

queue_banner.title: Ready to get hired? üöÄ
queue_banner.subtitle: You have {{count}} applications ready to go. Don't let these opportunities expire‚Äîsend your emails now!

groups.a_tooltip: Group A jobs are first in the government's queue. They have the HIGHEST chance of getting approved before the annual visa cap is reached.
groups.b_tooltip: Processed right after Group A. Excellent chances of visa approval.
groups.cd_tooltip: Processed in the middle of the queue. Moderate chances, depending on how fast the annual cap is reached.
groups.risk_tooltip: Last in the queue. High risk of the annual visa cap being reached before these are reviewed.

details.title: Job Details
details.active_early_desc: This job was detected the moment it was submitted for government approval. Note: it is still awaiting final certification (may or may not be approved). Applying now ensures you arrive first‚Äîyour resume hits the recruiter's desk before the mass competition starts!
details.group_a_desc: Maximum priority jobs. These employers are in an active hiring phase and typically process automated applications faster.
details.group_general_desc: Verified job available for processing. Follows the platform's standard application and response flow.
details.early_access_evolution_text: This job was originally identified via Early Access and is now a confirmed official H-2A/H-2B order.

upgrade.title: Exclusive Content
upgrade.description: Upgrade to unlock contact details and benefits.
